section.name: 5 - Energy
section.summary:
Objectives

By the end of this topic unit you should be able to:

  • Explain the meanings of kinetic energy and internal energy.
  • Explain what it means for a system to be closed.
  • Explain what it means for a collision to be elastic, inelastic, totally inelastic, or an explosive separation.
  • Given a description of a situation and a definition of a system, judge whether the system is likely closed.
  • Solve problems involving collisions in isolated systems in which we know that the system is elastic or in which we know what the coefficient of restitution is.
